Erik Wilde: Platform Success Factors: Make your platform journey a success

(2) Summary

Platform Engineering is one of the big trends of the recent past. Why is it important and what are the main success factors of platform engineering? The easiest way to get started is by understanding platforms as a way for more efficient development: Achieving economies of scale by pushing repeated work into the platform. A bit more advanced is to use platforms as a vehicle for standardization: By making opinionated decisions, you encourage and support teams to adopt a shared set of tools and technologies. The most challenging factor is to use platforms as a way to boost innovation: When teams start contributing their products to the platform, collaboration effort is reduced and the platform becomes a digital representation of your organization's core capabilities. We will look at these success factors in detail and also discuss specific steps you can take to get the most out of your platform investments.

(4) Platforms!

  • We're building an API platform and will be API First.
  • We're building a platform for our partners.
  • Our developers need a better platform.
  • We're moving to the cloud platform.
  • We want to become a platform.

(9) The Developer World is Complex

  • Source Control & Collaboration: GitHub
  • Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery (CI/CD): Jenkins
  • Infrastructure as Code: Terraform
  • Containerization & Orchestration: Kubernetes
  • Monitoring & Observability: Datadog
  • Logging: Splunk
  • Secrets Management: HC Vault
  • Package Management & Artifact Repositories: npm
  • Configuration Management: Chef
  • API Management: Kong

(15) Avoid Terminology Debates

  • Focus on the motivation for the platform ambition
  • Connect the dots across various ambitions and plans
  • Connecting business outcomes to IT initiatives is the most powerful tool you have


Business Impact of Platforms Erik Wilde: Platform Success Factors: Make your platform journey a success

(17) Platform Value

  • More Efficient Development: Internal Developer Platform
  • More Effective Collaboration: API Portals/Marketplaces
  • Digital Transformation: Digital/Business Platform
  • Becoming a Platform: Platform Business Model

Platform Success Factors Erik Wilde: Platform Success Factors: Make your platform journey a success

(19) Factor #1: Scaling

  • Shift Down is the new Shift Left
  • Self-Service makes development teams more efficient
  • Automation helps infrastructure team to handle scale


Platform Success Factors Erik Wilde: Platform Success Factors: Make your platform journey a success

(20) Scaling API Platforms: API Descriptions

Source: APIContext, "The Challenges of API Drift", White Paper, August 2024



Platform Success Factors Erik Wilde: Platform Success Factors: Make your platform journey a success

(21) Scaling API Platforms: API Drift

Source: APIContext, "The Challenges of API Drift", White Paper, August 2024



Platform Success Factors Erik Wilde: Platform Success Factors: Make your platform journey a success

(22) Factor #2: Standardization

  • The network effect
    • API developers: Established tools and practices
    • API consumers: Familiarity with design patterns
    • Business value: Easier usable API products
    • Platforms: Focused efforts on shared practices
  • Guardrails vs. Golden Paths
    • Remembering rules and difficult and unpleasant
    • Following established paths is easy and fast
    • Guardrails are safeguards and not the main guiding principle


Platform Success Factors Erik Wilde: Platform Success Factors: Make your platform journey a success

(23) Standardizing API Platforms: There Cannot Be Only One

  • Growing and evolving API landscapes are the new normal
  • Deciding on the one API style/technology/platform is a losing battle
  • Plan and architect for diversity
  • There is a broad spectrum between The One and Anything Goes


Platform Success Factors Erik Wilde: Platform Success Factors: Make your platform journey a success

(24) Standardizing API Platforms: Messaging System Landscapes



Platform Success Factors Erik Wilde: Platform Success Factors: Make your platform journey a success

(25) Factor #3: Collaboration & Innovation

  • Balancing effectivity and efficiency investments is key
    • Going faster (doing the thing right) is usually easier to do
    • Going in the right direction (doing the right thing) is harder but important
  • Use metrics based on business outcomes
  • Assess the landscape beyond your platform echo chamber
    • Platform engineering initiative to improve productivity
    • API management initiative to increase security
    • Developer platform initiative for better discovery


Platform Success Factors Erik Wilde: Platform Success Factors: Make your platform journey a success

Conclusions Erik Wilde: Platform Success Factors: Make your platform journey a success

(28) Building Better Platforms

  • Platform is a fuzzy term
  • A platform strategy aligns and guides platform efforts
  • Balance efforts across all platform efforts
  • APIs play a vital part in all (technical) platforms


Conclusions Erik Wilde: Platform Success Factors: Make your platform journey a success
